title: People are asking ‘How old do I look?’ on TikTok. A plastic surgeon walked us through what makes you look older than you are
description: Asking TikTok how old you look takes seconds; the trend is a whizzing snapshot of a moment in time. But the way we see aging as a culture has long-term implications — whether we can find a healthier relationship with it remains to be seen.

title: Why data quality is critical for marketing in the age of GenAI
description: AI startups may be some of the hottest investments right now but few have the calibre and deep scientific and technical know-how as the Stanhope AI team. This is emblematic of their unique approach, combining neuroscience insights with advanced AI, which presents a groundbreaking opportunity to advance the field and address some of the most challenging problems in AI today. We can’t wait to see what this team achieves...

title: Streamline Your Azure DevOps Pipelines: Advanced Docker Optimizations Unveiled
description: Between these two strategies, we recommend trying out the container registry cache first for its simplicity and ease of maintenance. Reserve the use of the Cache@2 task for those scenarios where you are dealing with exceptionally large image sizes....
